column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This time wasn't as memorable as the first that left me a bit disappointed. Taste was still good but texture wasn't so great. I'm not sure if it's because we ordered a medium so the baking is uneven.  The crust was almost too crunchy
column2: there was no cheese pull in the middle because the center wasn't heated up entirely... and I love melty cheese... and was disappointed when there was no pull at all. Pizza wasn't very hot either
column4: no melted cheese. There were some bites near the crust that had the right texture but center was definitely not.
